metadata.name: The Garden
metadata.description:
== Features ==
For answers to common questions, please see the FAQs under the Discussions Tab
* New room: The Garden * 13 new passive items! * New challenge: Genesis * New curse: Curse of Mortality * New bosses: The Serpents * New transformation: Deceiver! * New music * New sound effects
== Items ==
Shame: Enemies that move too close to Isaac have a short fear effect applied to them Forbidden Fruit: Tears become apples, shot speed up Deception: Shuffle consumable numbers (high risk/high reward) Creation: Damage, speed, shot speed up Granted Domain: Enemies stop moving when Isaac stops moving The Harvest: Upon clearing a room has a small chance to be rewarded with an item The Fall of Man: +2 Black Hearts. Removes all heart containers. For each container removed, +.5 damage Rebirth: Adam familiar that rotates very fast but deals large damage The First Day: Guarantees Angel deals Exiled: +2 heart containers, all heart drops are now black hearts My Beloved: +1 heart container. Hearts chase Isaac Crack The Earth: Randomly creates earthquakes under enemies, dealing damage. Legion: Muahahahaha... Deceiver! transformation: Killing enemies has a %5 chance to life steal (half heart). Poison tears.
